docs.title: OHDSI OMOP Common Data Model Working Group for Dentistry
docs.text:
Warning

This is a mockup website for testing purposes. It is currently under development.

docs.title: Meetings
docs.text:
Note

Thursday, April 18 at 7pm ET. Click for MS Teams meeting link

Meetings are traditionally scheduled for every Thursday at 7pm ET.

For other OHDSI Workgroups visit ohdsi.org/workgroups

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Learn OHDSI
docs.text:
During the 2022 OHDSI Symposium, community leaders taught a full-day tutorial meant to introduce participants to the varying steps along the journey from data to evidence using the OMOP Common Data Model, OHDSI tools and scientific best practices.

graph LR
  A[Start] --> B{Error?};
  B -->|Yes| C[Hmm...];
  C --> D[Debug];
  D --> B;
  B ---->|No| E[Yay!];
